mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_log (user_id, module, operation, method, params, ip, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{module}, #{operation}, #{method}, #{params}, #{ip}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_log SET user_id=#{userId}, module=#{module}, operation=#{operation}, method=#{method}, params=#{params}, ip=#{ip}, create_time=#{createTime} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, module, operation, method, params, ip, create_time FROM sys_log WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT id, user_id, module, operation, method, params, ip, create_time FROM sys_log ORDER BY id DESC
